attributes.action: ban the use of energy efficient lightbulbs containing a small amount of mercury.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the alleged "small"amount of mercury that is contained in an energy efficent lightbulb,and reports that the bulb is classified as unsafe,ie,if damaged,blown,or even just to dispose of it,as a subsance containing a small amount of mercury, it is certified as a hazardous substance. Therefore,why should we be forced to use these hazardous materials in our homes? We petition to retain freedom of choice to select our method of household lighting based on personal preference and with due regard to personal health and safety. Are the manufacturers of these devices prepared to arrange for their safe disposal at their cost(as specified under H&S legislation)?..
